synopsis.text: Coke cans are popping, laughter is echoing, and love is in the air as "School Rumble: 2nd Semester" kicks off with more zany antics and romantic mishaps! Harima is on a mission to confess his feelings to Tenma, but his path is littered with obstacles and misunderstandings. From his rumored relationship with Yakumo to the ongoing rivalry between classes 2-C and 2-D, there's never a dull moment in this high school rom-com. As the school prepares for the cultural festival, Harima must navigate through a labyrinth of love triangles, wacky situations, and his own comic career. So, buckle up for a wild ride as the madness continues in this hilarious and heartwarming sequel!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
